title: Sovrn Adapter Params
description: A schema which validates params accepted by the Sovrn adapter

tagid.description: An ID which identifies the sovrn ad tag

tagId.description: An ID which identifies the sovrn ad tag (DEPRECATED, use "tagid" instead)

bidfloor.description: The minimium acceptable bid, in CPM, using US Dollars

minduration.description: Minimum video ad duration in seconds

maxduration.description: Maximum video ad duration in seconds

protocols.description: The array of supported video protocols

w.description: Width of the video player in device independent pixels (DIPS)

h.description: Height of the video player in device independent pixels (DIPS)

startdelay.description: Indicates the start delay in seconds for pre-roll, mid-roll, or post-roll ad placements

placement.description: Placement type for the impression. Refer to List 5.9

linearity.description: Indicates if the impression must be linear, nonlinear, etc. Allowed by default

skip.description: Indicates if the player will allow the video to be skipped, where 0 = no, 1 = yes

skipmin.description: Only if the ad is skippable. Videos of total duration greater than this number of seconds can be skippable

skipafter.description: Only if the ad is skippable. Number of seconds a video must play before skipping is enabled

sequence.description: For multiple ad in the same bid request. This value allow will for the coordinated delivery of multiple ad

maxextended.description: Max extended ad duration beyond the maxduration if extension is allowed. Blank or 0 - blocked. -1 - allowed without time limit

boxingallowed.description: Indicates if letter-boxing of 4:3 content into a 16:9 window is allowed, where 0 = no, 1 = yes

playbackmethod.description: Playback methods that may be in use

playbackend.description: The event that causes playback to end

delivery.description: Supported delivery methods (1 = streaming, 2 = progressive, 3 = download). If none specified, assume all are supported.

api.description: List of supported API frameworks for this impression
